articles.author: Rishov Mukherjee
articles.title: How to get Modern Warfare 3 campaign early access - Dexerto
articles.description: Modern Warfare 3 campaign is releasing very soon. Here is a guide on how to get early access for the same.
articles.content:
Modern Warfare 3, just like its predecessors, will receive a campaign featuring a multitude of fan-favorite characters. Here is a guide on how to get early access to the campaign in the game.
